briefTitle: Doctor's Counselling Using Culturally-responsive Pamphlet Increased Mammogram Uptake Among Malay-Muslim Women in Singapore
officialTitle: Doctor's Counselling Using Culturally-responsive Pamphlet Increased Mammogram Uptake Among Malay-Muslim Women in Singapore: A Randomized Controlled Trial in a Primary Healthcare Clinic
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants who did a mammogram after imparting intervention.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Malay-Muslim women aged 50-69 years
* Citizens and permanent residents of Singapore without known history of breast cancer and have not undergone screening in the last two years

Exclusion Criteria:

* All those except Malay-Muslim women aged 50-69 years who are citizens and permanent residents of Singapore without known history of breast cancer and have not undergone screening in the last two years.
* Pregnant women
